Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillborough Way, south of the Fairy Dust Inn.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the road is the Great Fellowship Hall. An order known only as the Fellowship meets here regularly to pass along thier philosophy of law and order through religious supremacy. Of the many religious orders in Oceancrest, the Fellowship is usually the most unbelievable, yet the most alluring.
